p: PVDF membranes were blocked in TBS 0.5% casein 1 h at RT. Antibodies (anti-GFP, 11814460001, Roche; rabbit anti-PLCγ2 custom produced, rabbit anti-EGFR D38B1, 4267, Cell Signaling Technologies) were diluted in TBS with 0.2% Tween-20 (TBS-T) and incubated 1 h at RT. The membranes were washed with TBS-T and Western blots analyzed with Odyssey infrared imaging system (LI-COR Inc., NE, USA).
